thought: Slack API returns 'no_text' error indicating that the message payload is missing required 'text' field even when using blocks. The current Slack action_2 params only set 'blocksUi' but leave 'text' empty. Slack API requires a fallback 'text' field alongside 'blocksUi' for accessibility and notifications. I will add a 'text' field with the same dynamic content as in 'blocksUi' to the Slack action_2 parameters to fix this.
plan: Add 'text' parameter with dynamic message content to Slack action_2 params.
Keep 'blocksUi' parameter as is for rich message formatting.
Test Slack message sending to verify no 'no_text' error and messages appear correctly.
Verify Slack messages are sent to #general channel with expected content.
criticism: Current Slack action_2 params lack the mandatory 'text' field which causes Slack API to reject the message with 'no_text' error. Adding 'text' as fallback is necessary for Slack message acceptance.
